articles.description: Cruise ships may not be able to operate for some time due to COVID-19 infection risks, Australia's Trade Minister Simon Birmingham suggests.

articles.author: David Crowe
articles.title: Millions off JobKeeper as Frydenberg signals economic recovery is taking shape - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: More than 2 million workers have left the $101.3 billion JobKeeper scheme since the federal government reduced the wage subsidy at the end of September.
articles.content: Mr Frydenberg's office estimates the effective unemployment rate to be 10.5 per cent in Victoria, down from 14 per cent in September and ahead of the grim estimates for the state when shutdowns were … [+2477 chars]
